Price: ~$90-120

Price: ~$80-110

Covers 3,000 sq ft for 25+ devices. AC3000 speeds up to 3.0 Gbps with tri-band technology. Renewed certified model offering great value for mesh networking.

Mesh Add-Ons & Extenders

36. Like-New Amazon eero 6 Mesh Add-On Extender

Price: ~$60-80

Adds up to 1,500 sq ft of Wi-Fi 6 coverage. Seamlessly extends existing eero networks. Like-new condition offering excellent value for mesh expansion.

37. FIRSTNUM M5 Mobile Hotspot

Price: ~$50-70

Portable WiFi for travel in 160+ countries. Connects up to 10 devices with no SIM card required. Includes 1GB free data monthly with eSIM hotspot technology.

38. 4G LTE WiFi Hotspot Portable

Price: ~$40-55

Travel hotspot for 80+ countries with no SIM required. Connects 10 devices with 1GB global data included. Pocket-sized mobile router for travelers covering US, Canada, Mexico, EU, and Asia.

39. AT&T Turbo Hotspot 3

Price: ~$50-70

256 MB unlocked prepaid hotspot connecting up to 16 devices. Dual-band WiFi with long-lasting battery. Carrier unlocked for flexible use across networks.

40. SIGNALHIVE 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot

Price: ~$45-60

Includes 1GB monthly data with 8-hour battery life. Enhanced security features with no SIM card required. Connects up to 10 devices for portable WiFi on the go.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Wi-Fi Standard: Wi-Fi 7 offers fastest speeds and latest features, Wi-Fi 6E adds 6GHz band, while Wi-Fi 6 provides excellent performance at lower cost for most users
  • Coverage Area: Match router range to home size - small apartments need 1,500 sq ft coverage, medium homes 2,000-2,500 sq ft, large homes benefit from mesh systems
  • Device Capacity: Entry routers handle 15-20 devices, mid-range support 50-100 devices, premium models accommodate 200+ simultaneous connections
  • Speed Requirements: Gigabit plans need routers with 2.5G or higher WAN ports, while 500 Mbps plans work well with standard gigabit Ethernet
  • Mesh Capability: EasyMesh, AiMesh, or native mesh systems allow seamless expansion for whole-home coverage without dead zones
  • Wired Connectivity: Consider number and speed of Ethernet ports - gamers and NAS users benefit from multiple 2.5G or 10G ports
  • Advanced Features: VPN support, parental controls, guest networks, QoS for gaming, and security subscriptions add value based on specific needs

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Size: Standard 18x18” for couches; 12x20” lumbar for back support; oversized for floor seating
  • Fill: Down alternative (hypoallergenic), memory foam (support), polyester (budget-friendly)
  • Cover Material: Cotton (breathable), velvet (luxury), outdoor fabric (weather-resistant)
  • Insert vs. Cover: Inserts are complete pillows; covers allow customization and easy washing
  • Outdoor Use: Look for waterproof, UV-resistant, and mildew-resistant fabrics
  • Care: Most inserts are machine washable; covers often have zippers for easy removal

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Material Quality: BPA-free plastic ensures safety for food storage, while heavy-duty construction resists cracking and provides long-term durability
  • Size & Capacity: Match container size to items - small bins (1-6 qt) for crafts, medium (12-32 qt) for clothes, large (60+ qt) for seasonal storage
  • Lid Security: Latching lids prevent accidental openings, snap-on lids offer quick access, while airtight seals preserve food freshness
  • Stackability: Identical-sized containers stack efficiently to maximize vertical space in closets, garages, and pantries
  • Visibility: Clear plastic allows instant content identification without opening, while solid colors provide privacy for personal items
  • Portability: Handles and wheels facilitate easy transport, especially important for larger containers and moving applications
  • Versatility: Multi-purpose containers work across kitchen, closet, garage, and office environments, providing better value than specialized-only options

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

40. Neater Pet Brands Stainless Steel Bowl Set

Price: ~$16-24

Heavy-duty metal construction with non-slip rubber bottom. Set of 2 bowls, 6 cup (48 oz) capacity. Black finish bowls are dishwasher safe and ideal for large dogs.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Material Selection: Stainless steel resists bacteria and is most durable, ceramic offers weight and style, while plastic is lightweight and affordable but may harbor bacteria over time
  • Size Appropriateness: Choose bowl capacity based on dog size - small dogs need 1-2 cups, medium dogs 2-4 cups, and large breeds 4-8 cups per meal
  • Elevated vs. Floor Level: Raised bowls can reduce neck strain for large breeds and senior dogs, while floor-level works well for most dogs and prevents gulping
  • Slow Feeder Benefits: Puzzle and maze designs slow eating speed, reducing bloat risk and improving digestion, especially important for fast eaters
  • Non-Slip Features: Rubber bases or silicone mats prevent bowl sliding and protect floors from scratches and water damage
  • Temperature Control: Insulated bowls maintain water temperature while heated options provide fresh water in freezing climates
  • Easy Cleaning: Dishwasher-safe materials save time and ensure proper sanitation between meals

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

  • Material: Turkish and Egyptian cotton are premium choices for absorbency and softness
  • Size: Standard bath towels are 27”x54”, bath sheets are 35”x70” or larger

  • Care: Most cotton towels get softer with washing; avoid fabric softener for maximum absorbency
